website_summaries.verdict: An expertly constructed bag that protects your paddleboard against minor dings and heat damage.
pros: Designed to perfectly fit a wide range of BIC Sport paddleboards
Padded shoulder strap delivers immense comfort
cons: Handles may break, even after limited use
Not intended for carrying your paddleboard on a car roof rack

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly with Good Padding/Protection...Despite The Careless Writing
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the perfect size for my 10' Bic Ace-Tec and will definitely provide the protection I was looking for during travel and storage. My only complaint is that, prior to packing/shipping, someone wrote measurements on the reflective material in a blue sharpie marker which is super annoying for the price I paid for this bag. It doesn't change the function, but attention to detail and respect for a new product would've been appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: jennholl02

customer_reviews.title: BEST SUP BAG EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. I'm a big guy and needed a large bag for my 11'6" Jimmy Z board. It came next day, folded once and neatly packed. Very sturdy and great heavy-duty YKK zippers. It has grab handles and tie reinforcements to maneuver and secure to your boar or vehicle. Nice velcro closure to allow the fin to fit through. Enough room for paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Tony C.

customer_reviews.title: Much needed for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 10 6 SUP well. Durable. Handles are sturdy. Opening for main fin is nice. Had to remove my other two fins, however. Survived a 500 mile round trip strapped to the top of my car (at interstate speeds) no problem. No signs of wear. Use it now to store my SUP during the off season. Edit: I also added some extra light straps around it to keep it from flapping on top of the car. This probably also reduced wear on the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Luke T

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have an 10' 8" board which this fit into. Has a nice paddle pouch. I strapped it right onto my truck and had no problems transporting it 3 hours on the highway
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Mozdrzech

customer_reviews.title: Do not use with a roof rack
customer_reviews.text: Easy to transport and keeps board protected. Would not reccomend putting this on top of your car, mine has a big tear in it now.
customer_reviews.author: JAbrhmian

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 10' BIC Sport ACE-TEC Cross perfectly - like it was custom made for that board. Very well made. Good padding and handles. Can be stored in bag with fin mounted. Pricey, but very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dm

customer_reviews.title: First time use - carrying handle ripped
customer_reviews.text: We purcgased the bag July 11th, and used it Oct 8th for the first time to bring a 12 foot board from the US to Germany. The main handle in the center of the bag ripped immediately. We have now claimed that problem with the manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Joerg Gaebler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Protects my board from road rock/crude dings! Also easier to load and carry. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Forster

customer_reviews.title: it's a really nice bag and for the price I was surprised with ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to begin using this for my board and on the first day one of the handles broke, it's a really nice bag and for the price I was surprised with the low quality
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Comeau

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, good padding...definitely a little bit wide for my board...but overall it's a solid, nice, bag. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Ritts

product_meta.title: BIC Sport HD Stand Up Paddle Board (SUP) Board Bag
product_meta.description: The perfect complement to protect and carry your SUP Board. The BIC Sport HD SUP board bags offer a durable, protective way to carry and store your SUP. Made with 5mm foam and Durable 600D material at the nose, rail, and tail, these bags will protect your board for years. Features include Reflective Deck and Hull material to reduce heat of the bag when exposed to sunlight, outside paddle pocket for transport to the beach, and carry handles at the nose, tail, side, center along with a padded carry strap. Additional features include an extended zipper and velcro fin slot to make it easier to get your board in and out of the bag. Sizing = sizing of the bag. This means if you have an 11' Touring board, the 11' Touring bag is the correct size. Note that the BIC Sport bags have been optimized for an ideal fit with the BIC SUP range of boards.
feature_bullets: Durable, High quality, dependable, protection for your SUP board available for Touring and Round nose shapes
Reflective deck + hull material to reduce heat exposure when exposed to sunlight
Durable 600D material in nose, tail, and rails for extra protection + 5mm foam padding
Multiple carry handles and paddle holder + extended zipper for easier board loading and unloading
Sizing = sizing of the bag (11' bag for 11' board): Note that BIC board bags have been sized for an ideal fit to the BIC SUP Range of boards
